attributes.action: establish safe depositories for abandoned babies, similar to the German "baby hatches" where families who cannot cope with babies are given the opportunity to leave them anonymously safely in a warm, cushioned "hole in the wall" situated by hospitals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My local cemetary has a grave of an abandoned baby, named only by police, whose life could have been saved perhaps through this measure. Please consider,

a) funding
b) the best location
c) number 

but, I urge you to show how baby - friendly your policies are and consider a better option than the Dickensian practice of leaving unwanted babies on church steps or outside police stations, in cardboard boxes. Something needs to be done about this reproductive right to life. The petitioner is urging the P.M. to investigate the numbers of abandoned babies worldwide and provide facilities for them to prevent their possible deaths from asphyxia and hypothermia.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
